Posts.Content: Hi AnneCC although I have been using the site since my treatment (on 5th treatment only one more T to go) and found it very useful especially when I have felt like throwing the towel in I don't think I  know how to use it properly it keeps asking me if I want to use the new editor and when I click on members its blank I feel really stupid lol but I still have radiotherapy to go and 16 herceptin injections to go so its not over yet and want to make the most of the site can you help
Posts.Title: Recently been diagnosed, looking for support through my journey.

Posts.Content: Hi I just finished my last chemo 3 weeks ago the same treatment also with Herceptin my hair looks like it is starting to grow back (well I have some hair coming through a couple of mm I would think ) I lost all my hair after cycle 1 did you still have some hair left through your treatment? I was told the Herceptin injections would not interfere with my hair re-growth were you told the same? have you asked the macmillan team?   Sorry I haven't got an answer only questions  hope someone can help you with this
Posts.Title: Hair loss again 4 weeks after finishing chemo
